headline: Is Invitation Homes (INVH) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Invitation Homes is attractively priced or just fairly valued at today's levels, this article will walk you through what the numbers are saying about the stock. The share price last closed at US$27.65, with returns of 5.4% over the past 7 days, 2.2% over 30 days, a slight year to date decline of 0.3%, a 1 year decline of 7.9%, and a 3 year decline of 3.2%, while the 5 year return sits at 8.4%. Recent coverage of Invitation Homes has focused on its role in the...
